title: Homeopathy Courses | Australian Natural Therapists Association
description: Browse ANTA approved, high-quality course providers for homeopathy + information on how to become a homeopath and the key skills needed.
cleaned_text: Homeopathy classes and careers Homeopath workplaces After you complete your homeopathy classes and become qualified, you are likely to work in one of the following places: Private homeopathic clinics Private practice and consulting is a common path taken by qualified homeopaths. There are numerous private clinics operating across Australia, with enough market demand for more to arise. As a qualified practitioner, private practice will be an option for you, with all the benefits and satisfaction of growing your own business from the ground up. Wellness centres Wellness centres often rely on homeopathic practitioners to develop and coordinate their wellness programs. The principles of homeopathic medicine focus on holistic treatments, so a qualification in homeopathy lends itself well to management roles in a wellness setting. Medical centres Some medical centres offer allied health services and homeopathic treatment onsite. As a homeopathic practitioner in a clinical setting, you will need to liaise with referring doctors and work as part of a multidisciplinary team to deliver natural treatments to patients.
